body_html:
Try:

git pull --recurse-submodules
git submodule update --recursive

(I haven't tried this, but this is what seems like might work -- essentially the tree of each of tensorflow's submodules)

body:
Try:

```
git pull --recurse-submodules
git submodule update --recursive
```

(I haven't tried this, but this is what seems like might work -- essentially the tree of each of tensorflow's submodules)
